org.apache.storm.daemon.ui.resources

Class StormApiResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.daemon.ui.resources.StormApiResource

  • @Path(value="/")
public class StormApiResource
extends Object

    Root resource (exposed at “storm” path).

              needsTopoId=true)
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getTopologyProfilingDumpProfile(@PathParam(value="id")
